ngiemboon: Á gwáʼa fʉ̀ʼ gie mbʉ̀ŋ ge lú la.
en: It looks like it's going to rain.

ngiemboon: N gwéʼe ńgẅiin nkáb, mbà mèŋ n gʉa ntsíŋ.
en: If I had money, I would have gone to town.

ngiemboon: Andúm we cǔa ye, á líte ngwòŋ.
en: Her husband hit her, she let out a cry of alarm.
He fell and suddenly got injured.
